sentences.english: Poetry prophecy is an exotic flower in remote mountains which is in full bloom in our Chinese classics hundred-flower garden.
sentences.chinese: 詩讖是盛開在中國古典文學百花園裏的一株深山奇葩。

sentences.english: The gold and silver plates of Liao dynasty are beautiful flowers of the northern nomadic people.
sentences.chinese: 遼代金銀器是北方草原地區民族歷史文物的一支奇葩。

sentences.english: Your concept of maturity is pretty strange.
sentences.chinese: 你的成熟概念還真是奇葩。

sentences.english: Xiaqiang Culture is undoubtedly a wonderful one in the history…
sentences.chinese: 夏羌文化是祖國文化中的獨特奇葩。

sentences.english: To the natural environment, it may be said this university is like a exotic flower among all the domestic universities.
sentences.chinese: 就自然環境而言，可謂是國內的大學百花中之奇葩。

sentences.english: Today, the sinology flower is blooming in Yuancheng Foreign Language School.
sentences.chinese: 今天，國學這支奇葩正在校園綻放奇光異彩。

sentences.english: Xiao Hong as if a flower blooms in the Northeast .
sentences.chinese: 蕭紅，盛開於東北黑土地上的一朵奇葩。

sentences.english: The history of Tan's Cuisine has exceeded a hundred years. It is an outstanding branch of Cantonese cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 譚家菜已有百餘年曆史，是粵式風味菜中的一朵奇葩。

sentences.english: Russian culture is of great significance in the world.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯文化是世界百花園中的一枝奇葩。

sentences.english: The recluse culture with a long history is a miracle of Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 隱逸文化是綻放在中華文化之樹上的一朵奇葩。

sentences.english: Hakka Folk Songs in Guangdong is an artistic miracle of folk arts in China.
sentences.chinese: 廣東客家山歌是中國民間藝苑中一支獨具異彩的奇葩。

sentences.english: The Shadow Show is one colorful art form of Chinese folk culture.
sentences.chinese: 中國皮影藝術是中華民俗文化中的一支奇葩。

sentences.english: Li Ang's are the cream of Taiwan's feminist literary works.
sentences.chinese: 李昂的作品是臺灣女性主義文學中的一朵奇葩。

sentences.english: China's history of civilization is the history of the world a bright Wonder.
sentences.chinese: 中國的文明史也是世界歷史上一株璀璨的奇葩。

sentences.english: Framed BaoGuMing molested her strange flower, is simple BaoGuMing decided to resign.
sentences.chinese: 奇葩誣陷鮑家明非禮她，鮑家明決定辭職。

sentences.english: " Purchase shell corporations" is an odd flower in the M&A market.
sentences.chinese: “買殼上市”是上市企業併購活動中的一朵奇葩。

definition: imaginative/to have one's mind buzzing with ideas
(Internet slang) (of a situation, video clip etc) to make one think "wtf!"
nothing is too bizarre/full of extraordinary things
(neologism c. 2006) if you live long enough, you'll see everything/Just incredible!
spoof (web-based genre in PRC, acquiring cult status from 2005, involving humorous, satirical or fantastical videos, photo collections, texts, poems etc)
silly talk or "mo lei tau" (Cantonese), genre of humor emerging from Hong Kong late in the 20th century
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/go so far as to
